name: AppaRatus
description:
Summary

In AppaRatus you play as the cutest lab rat around.  Begin with your daily routine of  running the peaceful maze & collecting cheese in order to open  doors and progress to the exit.

Usually that would be the end of things but today is different, today is the day you make your escape! Outrun the genetically mutated rat of the labs previous experiments . Dash across the tables knocking over beakers and flasks with reckless abandon and make your way to freedom, lest you end up like your relentless pursuer!!

Aim Of The Game:

Solve the maze by collecting the cheese and finding the exit then prepare for a high octane escape to freedom.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Camera Control

Left Click - Dash (Escape level)

Credits:

Connor O'Neill

Keiva Brannigan

Rebecca Feeney

Michael Mcardle
